data.title: Sell Used Spectralink Equipment Phone System
data.meta_description: We buy used SpectraLink 84-series and KIRK wireless Polycom. Call to inquire about your specific models and get benefits to exchange your old SpectraLink.
data.text:
Sell Your Used Spectralink Phone Systems!

Whether you are going through a winding down, downsizing, migration, acquisition/ merger, or a technology revamping, we help companies of all sizes manage their used and working surplus equipment better!

We take in your valuable Spectralink assets for a fair price so you focus on your future business plans without hindrance.

Why Telecom Recycle

We present our clients with an actionable buyback program with complete and fuss-free bidding, pickups, labelling, shipping and encashment services. Our liquidation experts constantly monitor the market conditions so you get nothing but the fair and accurate market prices for your assets.

Drop us your queries today to get a quick quote on your used Spectralink Telecom & VoIP equipment!

We buy all models of your Spectralink equipment -used, new or surplus telecom and network hardware.

List of the Models we Buy:

Polycom KIRK/Spectralink Wireless

Polycom KIRK/Spectralink Wireless

Spectralink 84-Series Wireless Phones

Spectralink 84-Series Wireless Phones

Spectralink 8440 Wifi Phone For Microsoft Lync

Spectralink 8440 Wifi Handset

Spectralink 8440 Dual Charger W/Power Supply

Spectralink 84xx Standard Battery

Spectralink 84xx Extended Battery

Spectralink Polycom 8400 Series Quad Charger W/Power

Get a Free Quote for Your Used IT Equipment
